transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji mam boliye.
Customer: Haan. Check kar liya aapne leads aapko allocate ho gayi hai?
Executive: Ji abhi hui hai wo to aapka phone aane ke baad mein.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan haan main aapko keh to rahi hu.
Executive: Haan to nahi wo main aapko bol rahi hu.
Customer: Itna samay kaise lag gaya mam October ki baat hai October se abhi November chal raha hai. Maine kitni baar to aapke account manager ko bol diya mere jo jab Star Nawaz ji the uske baad abhi Manish ji hai Manish ji ko kitni baar bol diya. Ab bas 24 ghante mein karke dete hain 24 ghante mein karke dete hain abhi tak to hua nahi fir mere ko last mein complaint hi dalni padi aur kya karta main fir.
Executive: Ek second rukiye sir ek second.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Haan. Nahi wo hum logo ne tabhi bol diya tha apne managers ko ki usko allocate kar dijiye utna sir thoda process hota hai to usme time lag gaya bas.
Customer: Maine aapko jo screenshot bheja mam usme kya kya suvidhaye hain aur usme se kya kya chalu ho gayi hai meri?
Executive: Ek second rukiye.
Customer: Maine aapko whatsapp kiya tha abhi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Usme se kya kya chalu ho chuka hai ya nahi hua hai kya hai dekhiye na.
Executive: Dekhiye bulk buyer to hum hamesha apni apne aapki companies ko promote karte hain to bulk buyers bhi aapko offer karte hain bulk buyers bhi aapke paas aate hain theek hai. Social media promotion jo hai wo aapka always chalu rehta hai theek hai. Aapke catalog mein jo hai aap apne catalog mein kabhi bhi changes kar sakte hain aapka need.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hmm. Aur ye agent inquiry form iska kya hai?
Executive: Agent inquiry form.
Executive: Inquiries to aati hai na aapko direct inquiries jo hai wo likha hua hai yaha pe.
Customer: Theek hai. Bulk buyer ka aapne bata diya AI support in catalog.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapka jo catalog hai wo keywords ke according promote kiya jata hai theek hai aap apne catalog mein kuch bhi changes karna chahte hain aap use kabhi bhi kar sakte hain.
Customer: Achcha ye usi ke liye hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Aur ye local area booster?
Executive: Wo to sir wo to sir bahut obvious si baat hai jis jagah ki aapki GST hai waha pe hum aapki company ko promote karte hi karte hain locals par.
Customer: Achcha buylead gold package mein kya tha?
Executive: Buylead gold package mein jo aapko 20 non lapsible buyleads boli thi wo humne kala di hai wo wahi tha.
Customer: Theek hai aur ye whatsapp assistant mein kya hai iske andar?
Executive: Sir dekhiye whatsapp whatsapp assistant jaisi koi cheez nahi hoti hai aap whatsapp pe jo hai aapko messages aa jate hain jaise ki aapka account manager aap se connect karte hain wo cheez ke liye ya fir kisi bhi tarike ki koi notification hoti hai wo update aapko whatsapp pe mil jate hain aap aise consider kar sakte hain usko.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Bas ha lagbhag yahi tha aur main to lead se kaam ruk raha tha mera lead bilkul zero ho gayi thi theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai leads aapki allocate kara di hai humne theek hai ab aap isko use kar sakte hain. In case future mein aapko kisi bhi tarike ki koi help ki zarurat pade to aap Manish ko mujhe connect kar sakte hain theek hai. Ek kya naam hai mam aapka?
Executive: Rukhsar naam hai mera.
Customer: To aap inke head office mein baithte hain kahan baithte hain?
Executive: Main ha main head office mein baithti hu.
Customer: Theek hai okay.
Executive: Theek hai ye concern aapka open tha main isko close kar du ab?
Customer: Hmm aap kar dijiye koi dikkat nahi. Par inko thoda aapke jo Manish ji hai inko bataye ki thoda attach rahiye party se wo kaam nahi hota hai bas wo ek hi cheez ke liye agar do do baar phone karna pad jaye ya kehna pad jaye to fir matlab hi kya aapki ka.
Executive: Theek hai okay.
Customer: Hmm thank you.
Executive: Iske sath na hello.
Executive: Ji mam.
Customer: Haan main keh rahi thi ki iske baad na aapke paas ek feedback aayega jab main ek feedback email aayega jisme aap apna feedback share kar sakte hain ki aapka experience mere sath mein baat karke kaisa raha theek hai. I hope jitni bhi aapki queries thi wo resolve ho gayi hai.
Customer: Theek hai mam ji.
Executive: Theek hai ha mail bhi ek feedback aayega us pe share kar sakte hain apna feedback theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir theek hai thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads were not allocated in a timely manner.

- Wants to know about the features of the package.



Resolution:

- Leads have been allocated.

- Explained the features of the package.

- Explained about WhatsApp assistant.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, subscription, features, whatsapp
